articles.description: The French Open airs live on NBC Sports, Peacock and Tennis Channel through championships points at Roland Garros in Paris.
articles.content:
The French Open airs live on NBC Sports, Peacock Premium and Tennis Channel through championships points at Roland Garros in Paris.
